languages.text:
"Один на один схватились дух и Ульфар,
Пламя смертного духа и холод могильный,
Но постепенно чахнуть стал жаркий очаг,
Что сил придавал Ульфару в этом сраженьи.

"One on one
the spirit and Ulfar warred,
The flame of the mortal soul
and the chill of the grave.
But little by little
the hot hearth began to dwindle,
to Ulfar battle-strength granting.
languages.original_text:
"Один на один схватились дух и Ульфар,

languages.text:
「一対一で
精霊とウルファーは戦った
定命の魂の炎と
墓場の冷気が衝突した
しかし、徐々に
熱き炉の火は弱まり始め
ウルファーに戦う力を与えた」
languages.original_text:
"One on one
the spirit and Ulfar warred,
The flame of the mortal soul
and the chill of the grave.
But little by little
the hot hearth began to dwindle,
to Ulfar battle-strength granting.

traits.locale_text:
「一対一で
精霊とウルファーは戦った
定命の魂の炎と
墓場の冷気が衝突した
しかし、徐々に
熱き炉の火は弱まり始め
ウルファーに戦う力を与えた」

languages.text:
“邪灵与乌尔法的，
一对一之战。
那是凡人灵魂之火焰，
对抗死亡坟墓之冰冷。
但渐渐地，
乌尔法的力量开始减弱，
炽热的火焰开始熄灭。”
languages.original_text:
"One on one
the spirit and Ulfar warred,
The flame of the mortal soul
and the chill of the grave.
But little by little
the hot hearth began to dwindle,
to Ulfar battle-strength granting.

炽热的火焰开始熄灭。”

languages.text:
« Un duel à mort
Ulfar et l'esprit se livrèrent ;
la flamme de l'âme mortelle
contre le froid de la tombe.
Mais peu à peu,
la chaleur de l'âtre s'estompa,
offrant à Ulfar
la force de livrer bataille. »
languages.original_text:
"One on one
the spirit and Ulfar warred,
The flame of the mortal soul
and the chill of the grave.
But little by little
the hot hearth began to dwindle,
to Ulfar battle-strength granting.

Mais peu à peu,
la chaleur de l'âtre s'estompa,
offrant à Ulfar
la force de livrer bataille. »

languages.text:
«En duelo singular
el espíritu y Ulfar se enfrentaron,
la llama del alma mortal
y la frigidez del más allá.
Pero, poco a poco,
la ardiente hoguera empezó a menguar,
para a Ulfar poderío en batalla otorgar».
languages.original_text:
"One on one
the spirit and Ulfar warred,
The flame of the mortal soul
and the chill of the grave.
But little by little
the hot hearth began to dwindle,
to Ulfar battle-strength granting.

languages.text:
"Im Zweikampf
bekriegten der Geist und Ulfar sich,
die Flamme der sterblichen Seele
und die Kälte des Grabs.
Doch nach und nach
begann der heiße Herd zu erlöschen,
und schenkte Ulfar Kampfkraft.
languages.original_text:
"One on one
the spirit and Ulfar warred,
The flame of the mortal soul
and the chill of the grave.
But little by little
the hot hearth began to dwindle,
to Ulfar battle-strength granting.

languages.text:
"Teke tek bir savaştaydı
ruh ve Ulfar.
Fâni ruhun alevi
ve mezarın soğukluğu gibi.
Fakat azar azar
sıcak kalbi söndü,
Ulfar'ın savaşma isteği artarken.

But little by little
the hot hearth began to dwindle,
to Ulfar battle-strength granting.
